fields.description:
When running euca-bundle-instance, the operation fails and the following is logged on the Node Controller:
{code}
2017-01-10 15:02:58 DEBUG 000020113 log_argv                 | child process 20113 executing: //usr/libexec/eucalyptus/euca-run-workflow 'read-raw/up-bundle' --input-path '/dev/dm-11' --image-size '2361393152' --encryption-cert-path '//var/lib/eucalyptus/keys/cloud-cert.pem' --signing-key-path '//var/lib/eucalyptus/keys/node-pk.pem' --prefix 'foo' --bucket 'foo' --work-dir '/tmp/bundle-i-43551d04' --pid-path '/tmp/bundle-i-43551d04/process.pid' --arch 'x86_64' --account '000060293093' --access-key 'AKIAAECDYTIXY6OSCYMJ' --object-store-url 'http://10.111.1.68:8773/services/objectstorage' --upload-policy 'eyJjb25kaXRpb25zIjogW3siYWNsIjogImVjMi1idW5kbGUtcmVhZCJ9LCB7ImJ1Y2tldCI6ICJmb28ifSwgWyJzdGFydHMtd2l0aCIsICIka2V5IiwgImZvbyJdXSwgImV4cGlyYXRpb24iOiAiMjAxNy0wMS0xMVQyMzowMjo1MFoifQ==' --upload-policy-signature 'SJfuJdal5FKrxC5e/WSYrWXnU3I=' --emi ''
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000022532 lock_hypervisor_conn     | process check for libvirt succeeded
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000022532 lock_hypervisor_conn     | thread check for libvirt succeeded
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000022532 write_xml_file           | [i-9cad75d5] wrote instance XML to /var/lib/eucalyptus/instances/work/AIDAA53DKTY6VICXQXGGA/i-9cad75d5/instance.xml
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000022532 bridge_interface_set_hai | vn_i-9cad75d5/br0 hairpin mode is on
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   | 2017-01-10 15:02:58,880 DEBUG   BundleAndUploadImage parsed arguments from CLI: {'kernel': None, 'show_progress': False, 'bucket': 'foo', 'image': '-', 'part_size': 10485760, 'prefix': 'foo', 'ec2cert': '//var/lib/eucalyptus/keys/cloud-cert.pem', 'upload_policy_signature': 'SJfuJdal5FKrxC5e/WSYrWXnU3I=', 'productcodes': [], 'image_type': 'machine', 'destination': '/tmp/bundle-i-43551d04/euca-bundle-AFCaIO', 'location': None, 'bootstrap_auth': None, 'ramdisk': None, 'enc_key': None, 'max_pending_parts': 2, 'upload_policy': 'eyJjb25kaXRpb25zIjogW3siYWNsIjogImVjMi1idW5kbGUtcmVhZCJ9LCB7ImJ1Y2tldCI6ICJmb28ifSwgWyJzdGFydHMtd2l0aCIsICIka2V5IiwgImZvbyJdXSwgImV4cGlyYXRpb24iOiAiMjAxNy0wMS0xMVQyMzowMjo1MFoifQ==', 'bootstrap_service': None, 'enc_iv': None, 'user': '000060293093', 'image_size': 2361393152, 'bootstrap_url': None, 'arch': 'x86_64', 'block_device_mappings': None, 'retries': 0, 'security_token': None, 'url': 'http://10.111.1.68:8773/services/objectstorage', 'region': None, 'show_porcelain': False, 'privatekey': '//var/lib/eucalyptus/keys/node-pk.pem', 'batch': False, 'acl': 'ec2-bundle-read', 'preserve_bundle': False, 'cert': '//var/lib/eucalyptus/keys/cloud-cert.pem', 'key_id': 'AKIAAECDYTIXY6OSCYMJ', 'secret_key': None}
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   | 2017-01-10 15:02:58,880 INFO    Config finding global option default-region
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   | 2017-01-10 15:02:58,880 INFO    Config   novalue for default-region
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   | 2017-01-10 15:02:58,880 INFO    Config finding global option max-retries
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   | 2017-01-10 15:02:58,880 INFO    Config   novalue for max-retries
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   | 2017-01-10 15:02:58,880 INFO    Config finding global option timeout
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   | 2017-01-10 15:02:58,881 INFO    Config   novalue for timeout
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   | euca-bundle-and-upload-image: error: missing access key ID; please supply one with -I
2017-01-10 15:02:58 ERROR 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   | euca-bundle-and-upload-image: error: missing access key ID; please supply one with -I
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   | error: cannot open Packages database in /var/lib/rpm
2017-01-10 15:02:58 ERROR 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   | error: cannot open Packages database in /var/lib/rpm
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   | Traceback (most recent call last):
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   |   File "/usr/bin/euca-bundle-and-upload-image", line 6, in <module>
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   |     euca2ools.commands.bundle.bundleanduploadimage.BundleAndUploadImage.run()
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   |   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 269, in run
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   |     cmd = cls(_do_cli=True)
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   |   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/s3/__init__.py", line 120, in __init__
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   |     requestbuilder.request.BaseRequest.__init__(self, **kwargs)
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   |   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 95, in __init__
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   |     BaseCommand.__init__(self, **kwargs)
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   |   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 108, in __init__
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   |     self.configure()
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   |   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/bundle/bundleanduploadimage.py", line 64, in configure
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   |     S3Request.configure(self)
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   |   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/s3/__init__.py", line 124, in configure
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   |     requestbuilder.request.BaseRequest.configure(self)
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   |   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 148, in configure
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   |     self.auth.configure()
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   |   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/requestbuilder/auth/aws.py", line 65, in configure
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   |     raise AuthError('missing access key ID; please supply one with -I')
2017-01-10 15:02:58 ERROR 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   |     raise AuthError('missing access key ID; please supply one with -I')
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   | requestbuilder.exceptions.AuthError: missing access key ID; please supply one with -I
2017-01-10 15:02:58 ERROR 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   | requestbuilder.exceptions.AuthError: missing access key ID; please supply one with -I
2017-01-10 15:02:58 TRACE 000020065 euca_run_bundle_parser   | Source file read: 0%
{code}

The access key is in the request. [~gholms] supplied a patch that resolved this issue:
{code}
diff --git a/euca2ools/commands/bundle/mixins.py b/euca2ools/commands/bundle/mixins.py
index fddfc06..8a6f41c 100644
--- a/euca2ools/commands/bundle/mixins.py
+++ b/euca2ools/commands/bundle/mixins.py
@@ -387,6 +387,7 @@ class BundleUploadingMixin(object):
                 raise ArgumentError('--upload-policy-signature is required '
                                     'when using an upload policy')
             self.auth = None
+            self.AUTH_CLASS = None
 
     def get_bundle_key_prefix(self):
         (bucket, _, prefix) = self.args['bucket'].partition('/')
 
{code}
fields.summary: euca-bundle-instance fails with 'missing access key ID' error when run with an upload policy
